name: Space Pop (Mytholaran)
description:
Brace yourself for epic action. This DuckHunt - Like Shooter puts you behind the ray gun of Earth's last hope against the endless alien swarms. Zap them to infinity and get the highest score possible! 

This game was made as part of a 48 hour game jam. The only purpose was to make a game that works, then release it.

Go Zap some Aliens!

All Art, Music & Programming by Chocochunk & Mytholaran
Made In Godot Engine
Music made using BeepBox.com & Audacity
Art Edited in Gimp
